body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Singapore_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Singapore.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Singapore.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 4,320 × 2,880 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%
background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: The drawing was based from http://app.www.sg/who/42/National-Flag.aspx. Colors from the book: (2001). The National Symbols Kit. Singapore: Ministry of Information, Communications and the Arts. pp. 5. ISBN 8880968010 Pantone 032 shade from http://www.pantone.com/pages/pantone/colorfinder.aspx?c_id=13050

div.p: According to advice provided by the Ministry of Information, Communications and the Arts of Singapore, the national flag of Singapore may be reproduced in reduced size representations and displayed at all times, but it must be in its true form and colours, regardless of size: see National Symbols and References: The National Flag – Guidelines. Singapore Infomap. Ministry of Information, Communication and the Arts. Retrieved on 16 October 2007.

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this image:

img.alt: Flag of Singapore.svg

p.span: العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Galego | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | Bahasa Melayu | Malti | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Runa Simi | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | Türkçe | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

span.i: This image has been released into the public domain by its author, Zscout370. This applies worldwide.

span.small: In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
span.i: Zscout370 grants anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

p.span: Alemannisch | العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Български | Català | Česky | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Español | Eesti | فارسی | Suomi | Français | עברית | Magyar | Italiano | 日本語 | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Malti | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Português do Brasil | Русский | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | தமிழ் | ไทย | Türkçe | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:11, 4 May 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 05:14, 4 May 2010 (nope, FOTW is not right, Pantone 032 is the legal shade))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:38, 4 May 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 01:29, 4 May 2010 I requested the change based not only on FOTW but based on photos of the flag in use by Singapore government and military)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:14, 4 May 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 07:35, 10 January 2009 (nope; the SG government says Pantone 032 and honestly, a lot of the Pantone info on FOTW is not updated to current law))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:29, 4 May 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 07:35, 10 January 2009

td.span: ( I was emailed that the red is too pink, so going with official Pantone specs at http://www.pantone.com/pages/pantone/colorfinder.aspx?c_id=13050)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:03, 7 January 2009

td.span: ( I was asked to base my drawing from http://www.sg/explore/Singapore_Arms_And_Flag_And_National_Anthem_Rules.pdf, which I did. Only slight changes.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:46, 5 December 2008

td.span: ( Reduced more code by using notepad, with great thanks to User:Fibonacci)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:07, 2 December 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 01:54, 26 November 2008

td.span: ( Fixed according to page 5 of the "National Symbols Kit" and http://www.sg/explore/symbols_flag.htm. The crescent was too wide.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:20, 28 October 2007

td.span: (according to national law, the red color must be Pantone 032, http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:ociO2FbzmL0J:www.museums.org.sg/About_NHB/pdfFiles/flag.pdf+singapore+flag+pantone&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=4&gl=us&client=firefox-a)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:17, 28 October 2007

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 04:12, 6 February 2006 (my draw was matching that of VM's page, but I was told that is wrong))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:08, 7 January 2007

td.span: (recoded by hand; exact version according to fotw.net and vexilla-mundi.com)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:12, 6 February 2006

td.span: (Using clones this time; code slightly smaller)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:58, 6 February 2006

td.span: (I decided to not clone the stars, since something is not working out with the code, so I just wrote them as paths. I welcome any help to make the code shorter.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:13, 2 January 2006

td.span: (With some suggestions by khaosworks, I have tweeked the flag minorly.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:35, 23 October 2005

td.span: (The national flag of Singapore. The drawing was based from http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/singapore.htm. Category:SVG flags)
